t_house_property_user_unit.id, t_house_property_user_unit.user_id,t_house_property_building_unit.id AS unitId,t_house_property_building_unit.number AS number, t_house_property_building_unit.house_type,t_house_property_building_unit.house_type_picture,t_house_property_building_unit.area AS unitArea, t_house_property_building.id AS buildingId, t_house_property_building.org_id AS org_id, t_house_property_building.community as community, t_house_property_building.community_code AS community_code, t_house_property_building.area AS area, t_house_property_building.code AS code, t_house_property_building.floors AS floors, t_house_property_building.units AS units
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_property_user_unit.* FROM t_house_property_user_unit WHERE t_house_property_user_unit.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_property_user_unit.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_property_user_unit
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_property_user_unit.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_property_user_unit.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userId},'%')
AND t_house_property_user_unit.unit_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.unitId},'%')
AND t_house_property_user_unit.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_property_user_unit.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}

SELECT
FROM t_house_property_building_unit JOIN t_house_property_building ON t_house_property_building_unit.building_id = t_house_property_building.id JOIN t_house_property_user_unit ON t_house_property_user_unit.unit_id = t_house_property_building_unit.id AND t_house_property_user_unit.user_id=#{userId}
